Posts.Content: Oct 24, 2010 03:51AM - edited Aug 20, 2013 12:00PM by imatthew hi all, my wife had her mastectomy last friday (10/15) along with DIEP reconstruction, she's doing well but is very tired.  We have our post-surgical consultation with her breast surgeon on Thursday, at which time we'll receive the pathology results.  Her MRI, CAT and bone scans in August/Sept showed no sign of mets.  We already know her SNB was positive and she had dissection at the time of her mastectomy/DIEP. What questions should we be prepared to ask the surgeon?  My list so far:  - stage & # of lymph nodes involved? - extent of lymph node involvement (micro?  macro? extra-capsular) - likelihood of needing rads?  - margins (she had a skin saving mastectomy) We will also get the results of her mammaprint test.  Is there anything else we should ask about?  We meet with an oncologist on 11/3 to determine next steps. Thanks in advance.
